fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • The University of Westminster professor who co-authored a report, Estimating the Value of Discounted Rental Accommodation, is Peter Urwin, not Unwin as we had it (Why we must make homes affordable for key workers, 7 January, page 45). • A preview of an FA Cup third round match (7 January, page 6, Sport) said that in the Championship last season Sheffield Wednesday did the double over Middlesbrough. It was the other way around: Middlesbrough won both matches against Sheffield Wednesday. • Geography corner: We misplaced Cheddington when we said it was in Bedfordshire. It is across the border in Buckinghamshire (Three jailed over airdrop of cocaine worth £2.5m, 7 January, page 14).
